name: Joint PhD computational astrophysics Stellenbosch and Groningen
institutes: Astrophysics group, Stellenbosch University (South Africa), Kapetyn Astronomical Institute of University of Groningen (Netherlands)
status: Submitted. They had written 26th August as the start of interviews, only 20 days after the deadline. I did not receive any email from them and they aren't responding to queries (neither uni HR nor program coordinator).
comments: They have an AI/ML, radio astronomy and CMB focus.

name: Swinburne University of Technology (Melbourne, Australia)
ref_letter: They need the referees to fill in a form and send it to rshannon@swin.edu.au
comments: First they want us to express interest, if they think that there is a chance of getting a scholarship, they will allow us to apply. I am showing interest in an interesting project in changing fundamental constants and probing the accelerated expansion of the universe. Emailed the professor (Michael Murphy) about it.

name: Universidad Diego Portales (Chile)
comments: New department, new program, private university. They say that they prefer if we have some experience in research, yet I believe I was not shortlisted last time. Let's hope for the best, I put in a lot of effort in the application.

name: Universidad Andrés Bello (Chile)
comments: Private university. 90% Spanish content and faculty/students.

name: University of Atacama (Chile)
institutes: Instituto De Astronomia y Ciencias Planetarias
comments: In the middle of the Atacama desert, beautiful night sky. Good studious department. Public uni with social commitment.
